hey everybody i will not be able to post until july the 3rd because 
of a fucked up rule which says if a stautory holiday is on a sunday 
the places that close on statuory holidays have to close on monday. 
and i am using the net at the library and it has to close on monday. 
so the meeting will be held on tuesday.
